name: Hue Bicycle to Ancient Phuoc Tich Village 2Day
description: Phuoc Tich is the old quaint village located in the North of Hue City, which has been recognized as National Cultural Heritage Site by Ministry of Culture, Sport and Tourism of Vietnam. This 2-day trip will bring you unique experiences of home-stay with local hosts, try cooking skills of Vietnamese traditional dishes with cycling around Phuoc Tich village to visit some old-style houses, family chapel, and communal houses and find Cham culture vestiges still existing in this village. Another highlight of this journey is a nice cruise on the O Lau River to behold the charming & peaceful scenery of the village. Then we should not miss a visit to handicraft village Thuy Lap famous at the bamboo and rattan weaving for learning how the locals make their traditional production, pause at local market to behold the beautifully true moment of the local daily life.
